title: League Keeps Bugsplatting during Loading Screen
body: Ok so a lot of the time League crashes for me on my computer during loading screen. Sometimes this happens when its at 0% and sometimes while the game is actually loading. I have ping and everything but I don't know whats causing them. What would be a way to fix this problem?

replies.body: Same here this client sucks so much. Why put in a new client when it isnt even working yet

The client and game are completely independent of each other.  If you're getting a bugsplat wile loading the game, the client would have already become dormant.  I recommend going through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide as well to troubleshoot this towards a resolution.

If you're getting a bugsplat while trying to load the game, then a bad game file or even driver could be failing to render it.  You'll want to go through each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help fix this up and get back in game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
